name: Intubus, Inc
tag_list: selling-digital-content, selling-digital-products, selling-digital-goods, sale-content, sale-digital-products, sale-digital-goods
overview:
Intubus is the ultimate service for selling and publishing digital products — e-book, music, video, photos, software, docs, market research, scientific work, drawings or any other digital files. Intubus offers flexible and effective solutions.

Platform benefits

Sell everywhere All ads and widgets customize and compatible with your existing website or blog. Use special tools of Intubus for sale through social networks. Open your own shop of digital goods. Create subscriptions and special programs of your digital products.

Direct payments and commissions The money comes directly to your PayPal account immediately after the sale - 100 percent of the sales. You can sell as much as a lot of your digital content with no commission on sales.

Smart file storage Store all your files here. You’ll always have access to your content. No need to create dozens of copies of each file to be published on many websites. Sell​​, publish and managing your files directly from the file storage.

High efficiency and simplicity Nothing has to be pre-install and configure. You can create and customize the ads and widgets for all types of files. Intubus compatible with all websites, blogging platforms and social networks.

Viral effect All advertisements and widgets can easily be share by your friends and the fans. Intubus provides many tools to promote directly from the file storage. Each widget and ad has the tools to spread.

Advanced features Create subscriptions for premium content and your own store of digital products. Track statistics CTR (Click Through Rate) and the data of customers of each file. Quickly respond to requests, use the automatic update of previously published ads and widgets.
